indexing

Class BufferedArffMatrixWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • indexing.BufferedArffMatrixWriter

  • public class BufferedArffMatrixWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that provides fast buffered writing of block matrices while trying to allocate as little memory as possible. Is still a WIP but so far, the memory footprint is relatively low even for large files and many instances of this class, so long as the garbage collector does it's job. TODO replace Writer out with FileChannel to increase performance

      • BufferedArffMatrixWriter

        public BufferedArffMatrixWriter(java.io.File _file,
                        Vocabulary _vocabulary,
                        java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.Integer,Document> _documents)
        Constructor, creates a BufferedArffMatrixWriter with the given parameters. Does not write to the disk, merely creates the object!
        Parameters:
        _file - The file to write the matrix to.
        _vocabulary - The vocabulary of the matrix.
        documents - Provides class and name of the documentInstances to write.
